Troubleshooting
Using provided error reports
UISDK-build provides a comprehensive error reporting system. In most cases reason will be provided whenever build phase is not finished successfully. Example:
Command:
C:\project1>uisdk-build -f build3.js
Result:
(e): File build3.json not found
Indicates configuration file is not present.
Using help Help can provide you with suggestions that will make troubleshooting easier.
Usage: uisdk-build -h Other helpful options:
--show-configuration shows your configuration file --list-phases
Common errors
configuration file - not a valid JSON file
invalid options/values provided for tasks
executing build from incorrect location/missing condiguration file
external tool/script not runnable in current Operating System
